installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/ptero-eggs/installers:debian'

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## Install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.description:

示例：

爆破模式：
de_dust2, de_mirage, de_nuke, de_overpass, de_inferno, de_ancient, de_vertigo, de_anubis

人质模式：
cs_italy, cs_office

军备竞赛：
ar_baggage, ar_shoots

variables.name: Source AppID
variables.description: 服务器重启时更新游戏所需。请勿修改。

variables.name: 最大玩家数
variables.description: 指定能够加入服务器的最大玩家数量。

variables.name: 自动更新服务器
variables.description:
启用/禁用服务器在重启时自动更新。

默认设置为启用。

variables.name: SourceTV端口
variables.description: 用于连接观看服务器上游戏的SourceTV端口。

variables.name: Steam游戏服务器登录令牌
variables.description: 服务器公开显示所需的Steam账户令牌。可以在此处获取令牌：https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers

variables.name: 启用VAC
variables.description: 在服务器上启用/禁用VAC（Valve反作弊系统）。默认情况下将启用。

variables.name: 启用RCON
variables.description: 启用/禁用RCON以使用外部工具执行RCON命令。默认情况下将禁用。

variables.name: 服务器名称
variables.description: 设置Steam服务器浏览器中列出的服务器名称。

variables.name: 服务器密码
variables.description: 如果指定，玩家必须提供此密码才能加入服务器。

variables.name: RCON密码
variables.description: 用于获取服务器上管理员命令的访问权限。
